website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of a rechargeable model, this powerful tool is a sound option.
pros: Has a spacious lint catching compartment and sweater shaver attachment
cons: You will have to wait until the charge is complete, because the manufacturer doesn't recommend using it while charging

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had a battery operated one from the 90's that worked better than this thing. Wow. I mean, I spent like 15 mins trying to remove the little fuzz balls from some leggings, and it really just did a poor job. I made sure it was completely charged, and it was extremely disappointing. It only removes about half of what I would expect it would. It seems like the blades just aren't close enough to the guard, and they aren't adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: a good little fabric shaver that holds its charge forever!

customer_reviews.title: This Kooder fabric shaver is the best..
customer_reviews.text: This Kooder fabric shaver is the best....I have had this product for a while now and just decided to take it out of the box this morning to shave a sweater I wanted to wear for the day...Amazing!! I got out the batteries to put in it and found I didn't need any it's rechargeable .comes with a charger, extra blades,lint brush,a little brush to clean it out with, and it comes with it's own drawstring carrying case. It works great too. i would recommend this product and am going to buy a couple for my friends.

customer_reviews.title: Shaves but Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: The shaver works pretty well, but it is a little dangerous. The way the switch is located, you can turn it on (accidentally) quite easily when trying to remove the fuzz ball collector after use. If you turn it on accidentally doing so, you can shave your own hand. The fuzz ball collector is very difficult to remove. I'm not sure I would buy this again knowing these things- you shouldn't have to think too much when using a fabric shaver.
